column1: [Sam Dekker] To anyone playing ball overseas through the COVID year: Iâ€™m proud of you. Be proud of yourself. 10 months away from home, limited access to family, locked down in foreign countries, testing daily, no fans, traveling commercially country-to-country.

[Wojnarowski] After two seasons overseas, F Sam Dekker is returning to the NBA on a deal with the Toronto Raptors, his agents Andy Shiffman and Mark Bartelstein of @PrioritySports tell ESPN.

[Murphy] The Raptors are waiving Sam Dekker ahead of his contract guarantee date, per source. Raptors are flirting with the tax line, and will likely roll with a 14-man roster until the Dragic situation is resolved.
